<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle

align=left><FONT size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">企业<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">营</SPAN>活<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">利</SPAN>率<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">风险</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -3pt">、</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">价</SPAN>格<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">风险</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -3pt">、</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">信</SPAN>用<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">风</SPAN>险<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">等</SPAN>。对<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">于</SPAN>此类风<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">险</SPAN>敞口，<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">企</SPAN>业可<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">能</SPAN>会选择<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">通</SPAN>过利用<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">金</SPAN>融工<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">具</SPAN>产生反<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">向</SPAN>的风险<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">敞</SPAN>口（<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">期</SPAN>业务）来进<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">计</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">目</SPAN>标<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">是</SPAN>在<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">财</SPAN>务<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">企</SPAN>业<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">采</SPAN>用<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">金</SPAN>融<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">理</SPAN>因<SPAN

<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: auto 5.5pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto" 
align=left><FONT size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">企业应当按照本准则的要求，将套期分为公允价值套期、现金流量套期和境外经营净投资套期，分别进行会计处理。企业应当按照本准则规定进行套期关系的评估。适用套期关系再平衡的，企业应当进行套期关系再平衡，通过调整套期关系的套期比率，使其重新满足套期有效性要求，从而延续套期关系。企业一旦正式指定套期关系并选择应用套期会计的，只能在企业不再符合本</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">准则规定的特定条件时终止应用套期会计，不得自行终止应用套期会计。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpLast 
style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: auto 5.5pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto" 
align=left><FONT size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">本准则同时提供了套期会计的一种替代方法，即企业可以将符合条件的某项面临信用风险的金融工具的整体或部分指定为以公允价值计量且其变动计入当期损益的金融工具，以减少与作为套期工具的信用衍生工具之间会计计量的不匹配，使两者公允价值变动形成自然对冲，从而便于企业管理信用风险，减少损益波动。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>

style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">的预期交易的外汇风险引起的现金流量变动风险敞口进行套期。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: auto 10.55pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto" 
align=left><FONT size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>3.</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">境外经营净投资套期。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: auto 10.55pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto" 
align=left><FONT size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">境外经营净投资套期，是指对境外经营净投资外汇风险敞口进行的套期。境外经营净投资套期中的被套期风险是指境外经营的记账本位币与母公司的记账本位币之间的折算差额。此外，企业对确定承诺的外汇风险进行套期的，按照本准则的规定，可以将其作为现金流量套期或公允价值套期处理。例如，某航空公司签订一项</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>3</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">个月后以固定外币金额购买飞机的合同（尚未确认的确定承诺），为规避外汇风险，签订一项外汇远期合同，对该确定承诺的外汇风险</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">引起的公允价值变动或者现金流量变动风险敞口进行套期。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 11.05pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 21pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto; mso-char-indent-count: 2.0"><A 
name=_bookmark257></A><FONT size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">（三）套期会计方法</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 11.05pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 21pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto; mso-char-indent-count: 2.0"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US><SPAN style="mso-spacerun: yes"><FONT

style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">对于<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">满</SPAN>足<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">本</SPAN>准<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">可</SPAN>运<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">用</SPAN>套<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>会计<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -1.8pt">，</SPAN>是<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">业</SPAN>将套<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>工<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">具</SPAN>和<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">被</SPAN>套<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>项<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">目</SPAN>产生<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>利<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">得</SPAN>或<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">损</SPAN>失<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">在</SPAN>相<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">同</SPAN>会计<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>间<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">活</SPAN>动<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">影</SPAN>响的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">方</SPAN>法。</SPAN><SPAN

<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpLast 
style="MARGIN: auto 11.05pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 21pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto; mso-char-indent-count: 2.0"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">企业<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">开</SPAN>展<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">套</SPAN>期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">业</SPAN>务<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">以</SPAN>进<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">行</SPAN>风险<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">管</SPAN>理<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1pt">，</SPAN>但<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">是</SPAN>如<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">果</SPAN>按<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">照</SPAN>常规<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>会<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">计</SPAN>处<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">理</SPAN>方<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">法</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">可</SPAN>能会<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">导</SPAN>致<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">损益</SPAN>产生更<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">大</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">波</SPAN>动<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1.8pt">，</SPAN>这<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">是</SPAN>因<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">为</SPAN>企业<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">被</SPAN>套<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">风</SPAN>险<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">敞</SPAN>口<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">和</SPAN>对风<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">险</SPAN>敞<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">口</SPAN>进<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">行</SPAN>套<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">金</SPAN>融工<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">具</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">确</SPAN>认<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">和计</SPAN>量基<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">础</SPAN>不一定<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">相</SPAN>同。例<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">如</SPAN>，企<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">业</SPAN>使用衍<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">生</SPAN>工具对<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">可能</SPAN>发生<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">的</SPAN>预期交<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">易</SPAN>的价<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">格</SPAN>风险进<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">行</SPAN>套期，按照<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">常</SPAN>规<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">会</SPAN>计<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">处</SPAN>理<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">方</SPAN>法<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1pt">，</SPAN>该衍<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">生</SPAN>工<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">具</SPAN>应<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">当</SPAN>以<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">公</SPAN>允<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">价</SPAN>值计<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">量</SPAN>且<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">其</SPAN>变<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">动</SPAN>计<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">入</SPAN>当<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>损益<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1pt">，</SPAN>而<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">预</SPAN>期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">交易</SPAN>则需到<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">交</SPAN>易<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">时</SPAN>才<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">能</SPAN>予<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">以</SPAN>确<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">认</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.4pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">这样</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.4pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">企</SPAN>业<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">利</SPAN>润<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">表</SPAN>反映<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>损<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">益</SPAN>就<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">会</SPAN>产<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">生</SPAN>较<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">大</SPAN>的波<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">动</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.5pt">。</SPAN>再<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">如</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.5pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">企</SPAN>业使用<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">衍</SPAN>生<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">工</SPAN>具<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">持</SPAN>有<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>存货<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>价<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">格</SPAN>风<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">险</SPAN>进<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">行</SPAN>套<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt">，</SPAN>按<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">照</SPAN>常<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">规</SPAN>会<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">计</SPAN>处<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">理</SPAN>方<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">法</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt">，</SPAN>该<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">衍</SPAN>生<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">工</SPAN>具<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">且</SPAN>其<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">变</SPAN>动<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">计</SPAN>入当<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">而</SPAN>存<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">货</SPAN>则<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">以</SPAN>成本<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">与</SPAN>可<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">变</SPAN>现<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">净</SPAN>值<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">孰</SPAN>低<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">计</SPAN>量<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">这</SPAN>同<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">反</SPAN>映<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">动</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt">。</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">企</SPAN>业<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">使</SPAN>用<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">金</SPAN>融工<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">具</SPAN>进<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">行</SPAN>风<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">险</SPAN>管<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">理</SPAN>的<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">对</SPAN>冲<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">而</SPAN>由<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">于</SPAN>常规<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">会</SPAN>计<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">处</SPAN>理<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">方</SPAN>法<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">中</SPAN>有<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">关</SPAN>确认<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">和</SPAN>计<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">础</SPAN>不<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">一</SPAN>致<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1pt">，</SPAN>在一<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">定</SPAN>会<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">计</SPAN>期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">间不</SPAN>仅可<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">能</SPAN>无法如<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">实</SPAN>反映企<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">业</SPAN>的风<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">险</SPAN>管理活<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">动</SPAN>，反而<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">可</SPAN>能会<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">在</SPAN>财务报<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">表</SPAN>上</SPAN><SPAN lang=EN-US><FONT 
face=宋体>“</FONT></SPAN><SPAN

<H3 style="MARGIN: 13pt 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><A 
name=_Toc72425558></A><A name=_Toc11952114></A><A name=_bookmark258></A><FONT 
size=5><SPAN style="mso-bookmark: _Toc72425558"><SPAN 
style="mso-bookmark: _Toc11952114"><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">四</SPAN></SPAN></SPAN><SPAN 
style="mso-bookmark: _Toc72425558"><SPAN 
style="mso-bookmark: _Toc11952114"><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">、<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">关</SPAN>于套<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">期</SPAN>工<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">具</SPAN>和被<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">套</SPAN>期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">项</SPAN>目</SPAN></SPAN></SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></H3>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpFirst 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm auto 26.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><A 
name=_bookmark259></A><FONT size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">（一）套期工具</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 10.55pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>1.</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">符合条件的套期工具。</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">套期工具，是指企业为进行套期而指定的、其公允价值或现金流量变动预期可抵销被套期项目的公允价值或现金流量变动的金融工具。根据套期工具的定义和本准则的规定，可以作为套期工具的金融工具包括：</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 10.55pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>(1)</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">以公允价值计量且其变动计入当期损益的衍生工具，但签出期权除外。企业只有在对购入期权（包括嵌入在混合合同中的购入期权）进行套期时，签出期权才可以作为套期工具。嵌入在混合合同中但未分拆的衍生工具不能作为单独的套期工具。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 10.55pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">衍生工具通常可以作为套期工具。衍生工具包括远期合同、期货合同、互换和期权，以及具有远期合同、期货合同、互换和期权中一种或一种以上特征的工具等。例如，某企业为规避库存</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">铜价格下跌的风险，可以卖出一定数量铜期货合同。其中，铜期货合同即是套期工具。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 10.55pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">衍生工具无法有效地对冲被套期项目风险的，不能作为套期工具。企业的签出期权（除非该签出期权指定用于抵销购入期权）不能作为套期工具，因为该期权的潜在损失可能大大超过被套期项目的潜在利得，从而不能有效地对冲被套期项目的风险。而购入期权的一方可能承担的损失最多就是期权费，可能拥有的利得通常等于或大大超过被套期项目的潜在损失，可被用来有效对冲被套期项目的风险，因此购入期权的一方可以将购入的期权作为套期工具。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 10.55pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>(2)</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">以公允价值计量且其变动计入当期损益的非衍生金融资产或非衍生金融负债，但指定为以公允价值计量且其变动计入当期损益、且其自身信用风险变动引起的公允价值变动计入其他综合收益的金融负债除外。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 10.55pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">对于指定为以公允价值计量且其变动计入当期损益、且其自身信用风险变动引起的公允价值变动计入其他综合收益的金融负债，由于没有将整体公允价值变动计入损益，不能被指定为套期工具。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 10.55pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 楷体; mso-bidi-font-family: 楷体"><FONT size=3>【例<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -2.4pt"> </SPAN><SPAN lang=EN-US>1</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">】</SPAN>甲<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">公</SPAN>司<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">持</SPAN>有<SPAN style="LETTER-SPACING: -2.4pt"> 
</SPAN><SPAN lang=EN-US>1<SPAN style="LETTER-SPACING: -2.25pt"> 
</SPAN></SPAN><SPAN style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">年</SPAN>期的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">票</SPAN>据<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">，</SPAN>其<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">收</SPAN>益<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">率</SPAN>与<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">黄</SPAN>金价<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">格</SPAN>指<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">数</SPAN>挂<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">构</SPAN>。<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">甲</SPAN>公<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">司</SPAN>将该<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">票</SPAN>据<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">分类</SPAN>为以公<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">允</SPAN>价<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">值</SPAN>计<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">量</SPAN>且<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">其</SPAN>变<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">动</SPAN>计入<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">当</SPAN>期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">损</SPAN>益<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>金<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">融</SPAN>资<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">产</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt">。</SPAN>同<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">时</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">甲</SPAN>公<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">司</SPAN>签<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">订</SPAN>了<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">一</SPAN>项<SPAN style="LETTER-SPACING: -2.65pt"> 
</SPAN><SPAN lang=EN-US>1<SPAN style="LETTER-SPACING: -2.6pt"> 
</SPAN></SPAN><SPAN style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">年</SPAN>后<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">以</SPAN>固<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">定价</SPAN>格购买<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">黄</SPAN>金<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>合<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">同</SPAN>（<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">尚</SPAN>未<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">确</SPAN>认的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">确</SPAN>定<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">承</SPAN>诺<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -5.4pt">）</SPAN>，<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">以</SPAN>满<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">足生</SPAN>产需<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">要</SPAN>。<SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 10.55pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 楷体; mso-bidi-font-family: 楷体"><FONT size=3>本例<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">中</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">该</SPAN>票<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">据</SPAN>作<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">为</SPAN>以<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">公</SPAN>允价<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">值</SPAN>计<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">量</SPAN>且<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">其</SPAN>变<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">动</SPAN>计<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">入</SPAN>当期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">损</SPAN>益<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>非<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">衍</SPAN>生<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">金</SPAN>融<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">资</SPAN>产<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">可</SPAN>以<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">被指</SPAN>定为套<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>工<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">具</SPAN>，<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">对</SPAN>尚<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">未</SPAN>确<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">认</SPAN>的确<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">定</SPAN>承<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">诺</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">价</SPAN>格<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">风</SPAN>险<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">引</SPAN>起的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">公</SPAN>允<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">价</SPAN>值<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">变</SPAN>动<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">风</SPAN>险<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">敞</SPAN>口进<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">行</SPAN>套<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>。<SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 5.9pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体">需要注意的是，并非所有以公允价值计量且其变动计入当期损益的金融工具均为符合条件的套期工具。企业应当对因运用公允价值选择权而被指定为以公允价值计量且其变动计入当期损益的金融工具进行评估，以确保套期工具的指定并未与运用公允价值选择权的目标相冲突，即不会再次产生已通过运用公允价值选择权消除的会计错配。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 5.9pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT 
face=宋体>(3)</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体">对于外汇风险套期，企业可以将非衍生金融资产（选择以公允价值计量且其变动计入其他综合收益的非交易性权益工具投资除外）或非衍生金融负债的外汇风险成分指定为套期工具。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 10.6pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 楷体; mso-bidi-font-family: 楷体"><FONT size=3>【例 <SPAN 
lang=EN-US>2</SPAN>】甲公司的记账本位币为人民币，发行了 <SPAN lang=EN-US>5000 </SPAN>万美元、年利率<SPAN 
lang=EN-US> 5%</SPAN>的固定利率债券，每半年支付一次利息，<SPAN lang=EN-US>2 
</SPAN>年后到期。甲公司将该债券分类为以摊余成本计量的金融负债。甲公司 同时签订了 <SPAN lang=EN-US>2 
</SPAN>年后到期的、<SPAN lang=EN-US>5000 </SPAN>万美元的固定价格销售承诺（尚未确认的确 <SPAN 
lang=EN-US>12 </SPAN>定承诺）。<SPAN lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 10.6pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 楷体; mso-bidi-font-family: 楷体"><FONT size=3>本例<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">中</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">甲</SPAN>公<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">司</SPAN>可<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">以</SPAN>将<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">以</SPAN>摊余<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">成</SPAN>本<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">计</SPAN>量<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>美<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">元</SPAN>负<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">债</SPAN>的外<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">汇</SPAN>风<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">险</SPAN>成<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">分</SPAN>作<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">为</SPAN>套<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>工具<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1pt">，</SPAN>对<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">固定</SPAN>价格销<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">售</SPAN>承<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">诺</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">外</SPAN>汇<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">风</SPAN>险<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">引</SPAN>起的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">公</SPAN>允<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">价</SPAN>值<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">变</SPAN>动<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">或</SPAN>者<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">现</SPAN>金流<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">量</SPAN>变<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">动</SPAN>风<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">险</SPAN>敞<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">口</SPAN>进<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">行</SPAN>套期。<SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm auto 26.1pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT face=宋体>2.</FONT> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">对</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">套<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>工<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">具</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">指</SPAN>定。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 5.9pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT 
face=宋体>(1)</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体">企业在确立套期关系时，应当将前述符合条件的金融工具整体（或外汇风险套期中的非衍生金融资产或非衍生金融负债的外汇风险成分）指定为套期工具。因为企业对套期工具进行计量时，通常以该金融工具整体为对象，采用单一的公允价值基础对其进行计量。但是，由于期权的时间价值、远期合同的远期要素和金融工具的外汇基差通常具备套期成本的特征且可以单独计量，为便于提高某些套期关系的有效性，本准则允许企业在对套期工具进行指定时，作出以下例外处理：</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 5.9pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT face=宋体>①</FONT> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体">对于期权，企业可以将期权的内在价值和时间价值分开，只将期权的内在价值变动指定为套期工具。期权的价值包括内在价值</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT face=宋体>(</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体">立即执行期权时现货价格与行权价格之差所带来的收益）和时间价值（期权的价格与内在价值之差）。随着期权临近到期，期权的时间价值不断减少直至为零。当企业仅指定期权的内在价值变动为套期工具时，与期权的时间价值相关的公允价值变动</SPAN><SPAN 
style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体">被排除在套期有效性评估之外，从而能够提高套期的有效性。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 5.9pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT face=宋体>②</FONT> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体">对于远期合同，企业可以将远期合同的远期要素和即期要素分开，只将即期要素的价值</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">变动<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">指</SPAN>定<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">为</SPAN>套<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>工<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">具</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt">。</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">远</SPAN>期合<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">同</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">即</SPAN>期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">要</SPAN>素<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">反</SPAN>映<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">了</SPAN>基础<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">项</SPAN>目<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">远</SPAN>期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">价</SPAN>格<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">和</SPAN>现<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">货</SPAN>价格<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>差<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">异</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">而远</SPAN>期要素<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>特<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">征</SPAN>取<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">决</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.05pt">于</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">不</SPAN>同<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>基础<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">项</SPAN>目<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1.8pt">。</SPAN>当<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">企</SPAN>业<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">仅</SPAN>指<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">定</SPAN>远期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">合</SPAN>同<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>即<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>要<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">素</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">价</SPAN>值变<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">动</SPAN>为<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">套</SPAN>期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">工具时</SPAN>，能够<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">提</SPAN>高<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">套</SPAN>期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>有<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">效</SPAN>性。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 15.55pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>③</FONT><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.15pt"> </SPAN></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">对<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">于</SPAN>金融工<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">具</SPAN>，企<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">业</SPAN>可<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">以</SPAN>将金融<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">工</SPAN>具的外<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">汇</SPAN>基差<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">单</SPAN>独分拆<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">，</SPAN>只将排<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">除</SPAN>外汇<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">基</SPAN>差后的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.1pt">金</SPAN>融</SPAN><FONT face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">工具<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">指</SPAN>定<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">为</SPAN>套<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>工<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">具</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.65pt">。</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">外</SPAN>汇基<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">差</SPAN>反<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">映</SPAN>了<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">货</SPAN>币<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">主</SPAN>权<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">信</SPAN>用差<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">异</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.65pt">、</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">市</SPAN>场<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">供</SPAN>求<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">等</SPAN>因<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">素</SPAN>所带<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">来</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">成</SPAN>本<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.75pt">。</SPAN>将外汇基<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">差</SPAN>分<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">拆</SPAN>，<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">只</SPAN>将<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">排</SPAN>除<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">外</SPAN>汇基<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">差</SPAN>后<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>金<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">融</SPAN>工<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">具</SPAN>指<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">定</SPAN>为套<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>工<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">具</SPAN>，<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">能</SPAN>够<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">提</SPAN>高<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">套</SPAN>期的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">有</SPAN>效<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">性</SPAN>。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 15.55pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT 
face=宋体>(2)</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">企</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">业<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">可</SPAN>以<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">将</SPAN>套<SPAN

<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle

size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">本准则规定，境外经营净投资可以被指定为被套期项目。境外经营净投资，是指企业在境外经营净资产中的权益份额。企业既无计划也无可能在可预见的未来会计期间结算的长期外币货币</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">性应收项目（含贷款），应当视同实质构成境外经营净投资的组成部分。因销售商品或提供劳务等形成的期限较短的应收账款不构成境外经营净投资。</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">境外经营可以是企业在境外的子公司、合营安排、联营企业或分支机构。在境内的子公司、合营安排、联营企业或分支机构，采用不同于企业记账本位币的，也视同境外经营。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">价</SPAN><SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">企</SPAN>业可<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">财</SPAN>务<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">汇</SPAN>风<SPAN

<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: 0.1pt 0cm auto; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 21pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto; mso-char-indent-count: 2.0"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>2.</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">项目组成部分作为被套期项目的规定和要求。</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">按照本准则的规定，企业可以将上述已确认资产或负债、尚未确认的确定承诺、极可能发生的预期交易以及境外经营净投资等单个项目整体或者项目组合指定为被套期项目，企业也可以将上述单个项目或者项目组合的一部分（项目组成部分）指定为被套期项目。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: 0.1pt 0cm auto; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 21pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto; mso-char-indent-count: 2.0"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">项目组成部分是指小于项目整体公允价值或现金流量变动的部分，它仅反映其所属项目整体</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">面临的某些风险，或仅反映一定程度的风险（例如对某项目的一定比例进行指定时）。按照本准</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">则的规定，企业只能将下列项目组成部分或其组合指定为被套期项目：</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: 0.1pt 0cm auto; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 21pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto; mso-char-indent-count: 2.0"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>(1)</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">项目整体公允价值或现金流量变动中仅由某一个或多个特定风险引起的公允价值或现金流量变动部分（风险成分）。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: 0.1pt 0cm auto; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 21pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto; mso-char-indent-count: 2.0"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">在风险管理实务中，企业经常不是为了对被套期项目整体公允价值或现金流量变动进行套期，而仅<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">为</SPAN>了<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">对</SPAN>特<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">定</SPAN>风<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">险</SPAN>成<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">分</SPAN>进行<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">套</SPAN>期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1.8pt">。</SPAN>允<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">许</SPAN>对<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">风</SPAN>险<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">成</SPAN>分进<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">行</SPAN>指<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">定</SPAN>使<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">企</SPAN>业<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">能</SPAN>够<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">更</SPAN>灵活<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">地</SPAN>识<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">别</SPAN>被<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">套期</SPAN>风险<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.65pt">。</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">按</SPAN>照<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">本</SPAN>准<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">则</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">规</SPAN>定<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.75pt">，</SPAN>在将<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">风</SPAN>险<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">成</SPAN>分<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">指</SPAN>定<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">为</SPAN>被<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">套</SPAN>期项<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">目</SPAN>时<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.75pt">，</SPAN>该<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">风</SPAN>险<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">成</SPAN>分<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">应</SPAN>当能<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">够</SPAN>单<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">独</SPAN>识<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">别</SPAN>并可靠计<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">量</SPAN>。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: 0.1pt 0cm auto; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 21pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto; mso-char-indent-count: 2.0"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">在识别可被指定为被套期项目的风险成分时，企业应当基于该等风险及相关套期活动所发生的特定市场环境进行评估，并考虑因风险和市场而异的相关事实和情况（例如相关风险成分是否</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">都有市场报价从而能够可靠计量）。同时，企业应当考虑该风险成分是合同明确的风险成分，还</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">是非合同明确的风险成分。非合同明确的风险成分存在于两种情况：</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>①</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">不构成合同的项目（例如极可能发生的预期交易）；</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>②</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">未明确该风险成分的合同（例如确定承诺中仅包含一项单一价格，并未列明基于不同基础变量的定价公式）。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle

style="FONT-FAMILY: 楷体; mso-bidi-font-family: 楷体"><FONT size=3>【例<SPAN 
lang=EN-US> 
11</SPAN>】甲公司为一家航空公司，为了管理其所消耗的航空燃油价格风险，对未来拟购买的部分航空燃油进行套期。甲公司基于进行套期的时间跨度（时间跨度会影响衍生工具的市场流动性），使用了不同类 
型的套期工具对未来拟购买的航空燃油价格变动风险敞口进行套期。其中，对于较长的时间跨度（<SPAN lang=EN-US>12 </SPAN>个月至 <SPAN 
lang=EN-US>24 </SPAN>个月），甲公司使用原油期货合同进行套期，因为只有此类原油期货合同才具有充分的市场流动性；对于 <SPAN 
lang=EN-US>6 </SPAN>个月至 <SPAN lang=EN-US>12 
</SPAN>个月的时间跨度，甲公司使用具有充分流动性的柴油期货合同进行套期；对于 <SPAN lang=EN-US>6 
</SPAN>个月以下的时间跨度，甲公司则使用航空燃油期货合同进行套期。本例中，尽管甲公司没有任何合同安排对航空燃油中的原油和柴油成分作出明确规定，但甲公司仍可得出结论认为，其购买航空燃油的价格风险包括原油价格风险成分和柴油价格风险成分，这两项风险成分属于非合同明确的风险成分，并且这两项风险成分能够单独识别并可靠计量。因此，甲公司可以将这两项风险成分指定为被套期项目。<SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></P>

size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>④</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">被套期项目的名义金额的某一层。例如，金额为</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体> 1</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">亿元的确定承诺的最后</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体> 8 000</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">万元部分；金额为</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体> 1</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">亿元的固定利率债券的底层</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体> 2 000</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">万元部分；可按公允价值提前偿付的总金额为</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体> 1</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">亿元（设定的名义金额为</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体> 1</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">亿元）的固定利率债务的顶层</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体> 3 000</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">万元部分。如果某一层级部分在公允价值套期中被指定为被套期项目，则企业应从设定的名义金额中对其进行指定。企业应根据公允价值变动重新计量被套期项目（即根据归属于被套期风险的公允价</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">值变动重新计量相关项目），以满足公允价值套期的要求。公允价值套期调整必须在损益中确认，且确认时间不得迟于该项目终止确认的时点。因此，企业应当对所设定的名义金额进行跟踪。例如，必须对上述设定的总名义金额</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体> 1</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">亿元的固定利率债券进行跟踪，以跟踪底层的</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体> 2 000</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">万元或顶层的</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体> 3 000</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">万元部分。</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">如果项目整体的某一层级部分包含提前还款权，且该提前还款权的公允价值受被套期风险变化影响的，企业不得将该层级指定为公允价值套期的被套期项目，但企业在计量被套期项目的公</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">允价值时已包含该提前还款权影响的情况除外。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 21pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-char-indent-count: 2.0"><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 楷体; mso-bidi-font-family: 楷体"><FONT size=3>【例<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -2.65pt"> </SPAN><SPAN lang=EN-US 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">1</SPAN><SPAN lang=EN-US>3</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1.45pt">】</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">甲公司向乙银行申请了一笔本金为 <SPAN lang=EN-US>100 
</SPAN>万元人民币、期限为<SPAN lang=EN-US> 5 </SPAN>年的贷款，该贷款允许债务人于每年年末最多偿还本金 <SPAN 
lang=EN-US>10 </SPAN>万元，即贷款本金中的 <SPAN lang=EN-US>40 </SPAN>万元可以提前偿还（分别在贷款第<SPAN 
lang=EN-US> 1 </SPAN>年至第<SPAN lang=EN-US> 4 </SPAN>年年末偿还），而贷款本金中的 <SPAN 
lang=EN-US>60 </SPAN>万元则不可提前偿还且具有<SPAN lang=EN-US> 5 </SPAN>年的固定期限。由于该 <SPAN 
lang=EN-US>60 
</SPAN>万元属于固定期限债务、不可提前偿还，且其公允价值不包含提前还款选择权的影响（即该层组成部分不包含提前还款选择权），因此，甲公司可将此项金额的某一层组成部分指定为被套期项目。但是，与可提前还款的 
<SPAN lang=EN-US>40 </SPAN>万元相关的公允价值变动则包含提前还款选择权（其公允价值受利率变动风险的影响），因此，<SPAN 
lang=EN-US>40 
</SPAN>万元的该层组成部分无法成为符合条件的项目组成部分，不能作为被套期项目，除非甲公司在确定被套期项目的公允价值变动时已包含相关提前还款选择权的影响。<SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 1.7pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 21pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto; mso-char-indent-count: 2.0"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT face=宋体>3.</FONT> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">汇</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">总<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">风</SPAN>险<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">敞</SPAN>口<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">作</SPAN>为<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">被套</SPAN>期项<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">目</SPAN>的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">规</SPAN>定<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">和</SPAN>要<SPAN

lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 1.7pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 21pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto; mso-char-indent-count: 2.0"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">本准则规定，企业可以将符合被套期项目条件的风险敞口与衍生工具组合形成的汇总风险敞口指定为被套期项目。在指定此类被套期项目时，企业应当评估该汇总风险敞口是否是由风险敞口与衍生工具相结合，从而产生了不同于该风险敞口的另一个风险敞口，并将其作为针对某项（或几项）特定风险的一个风险敞口进行管理。在这种情况下，企业可基于该汇总风险敞口指定被套期项目。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 21pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-char-indent-count: 2.0"><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 楷体; mso-bidi-font-family: 楷体"><FONT size=3>【例 <SPAN 
lang=EN-US>14</SPAN>】甲公司的记账本位币为人民币，利用合同期限为<SPAN lang=EN-US> 15 
</SPAN>个月的咖啡期货合同对在未来<SPAN lang=EN-US>15 
</SPAN>个月后极可能发生的确定数量的咖啡采购进行套期，以管理其价格风险（基于美元的）。该极可能发生的咖啡采购和咖徘期货合同的组合可被视为一项 <SPAN 
lang=EN-US>15 </SPAN>个月后固定金额的美元外汇风险敞口（汇总风险敞口）。<SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></P>

</SPAN>引起的现金流量变动。但是，在该负债的剩余存续期内，如果<SPAN lang=EN-US> 3 </SPAN>个月期<SPAN

</SPAN>个基点，则该负债的现金流量变动将低于<SPAN lang=EN-US> 3 </SPAN>个月期<SPAN lang=EN-US> SHIBOR 
</SPAN>引起的现金流量变动。<SPAN lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></P>

</SPAN>引起的负债现金流量变动），指定为被套期项目。<SPAN
