style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>价<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">值</SPAN>变<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">动</SPAN>，<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">信</SPAN>用<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">风</SPAN>险的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">变</SPAN>化<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">也</SPAN>未<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">必</SPAN>形<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">成</SPAN>主<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">导</SPAN>作用。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 15.55pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT 
face=宋体>(3)</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">套</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">关</SPAN>系<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>套<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>比<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">率</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1.7pt">，</SPAN>应<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">当</SPAN>等<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">于</SPAN>企<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">业</SPAN>实<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">际</SPAN>套<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>的被<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">套</SPAN>期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">项</SPAN>目<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">数</SPAN>量<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">与</SPAN>对<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">其</SPAN>进行<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">套</SPAN>期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的套</SPAN>期工具<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">实</SPAN>际<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">数</SPAN>量<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">之</SPAN>比。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 15.55pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">被套期项目和套期工具的数量可根据其性质采用多种方式进行计量。作为一般原则，套期关</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">系的套期比率应当与从风险管理角度而设定的套期比率相同。在某些情况下，套期比率可能为</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> 1:1</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">，因为被套期项目的关键条款将与套期工具的关键条款相匹配；然而在实务中的很多情况下，由于</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">多种原因，实际套期比率可能并非</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> 1:1</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">。如果企业对某一项目不足</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> 100%</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">的风险敞口（例如，</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体>85%)</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">进行套期，则其用来指定套期关系的套期比率应当与上述</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> 85%</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">的风险敞口以及企业用于对上述</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> 85%</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">的风险敞口进行套期的套期工具实际数量所形成的套期比率相一致。与此类似，如果企业使用名义金额为</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> 40</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">个单位的金融工具对某个风险敞口进行套期，则其用来指定套期关系的套期比率应当与上述</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> 40</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">个单位（即企业不能使用其所持有的总数中更多的数量单位或更少的数量单位来确</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">定套期比率），以及实际被套期项目的数量所形成的套期比率相一致。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 15.55pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">套期比率不应当反映被套期项目和套期工具相对权重的失衡，这种失衡会导致套期无效，并</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">可能产生与套期会计目标不一致的会计结果。因此，在指定套期关系时，企业必须调整由其实际</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">使用的被套期项目数量和套期工具数量形成的套期比率，以避免这种失衡。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 15.55pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">如果被套期项目和套期工具的特定权重将导致套期无效部分，企业应当确定该套期无效部分是否具有商业理由。例如，企业使用标准咖啡期货合同对</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> 100</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">吨咖啡采购进行套期，每份期货合</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">同的标准数量为</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> 37500</FONT> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">镑（</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体>1</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">磅</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体>=0.4536</FONT> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">千克）。企业只能使用</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> 5</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">份或</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> 6</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">份合同（分别相当于</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> 85_0</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">吨和</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> 102.1</FONT> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">吨）对</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> 100</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">吨的咖啡采购进行套期。在这种情况下，企业应当采用由其实际使用的咖啡期货合同数量形成的套期比率来指定套期关系，因为由被套期项目和套期工具的权重不匹配导</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">致的套期无效部分不会产生与套期会计目标不一致的会计结果。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 15.55pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">企业不得为避免确认现金流量套期的无效部分而改变现金流量套期比率，也不得为创造更多</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">的被套期项目公允价值调整而改变公允价值套期比率。这种会计结果不符合套期会计的目标。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 21.8pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-char-indent-count: 2.0"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体>3.</FONT> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">套期有效性评价方法。</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> <SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 15.55pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">企业应当在套期开始日及以后期间持续地对套期关系是否符合套期有效性要求进行评估，尤其应当分析在套期剩余期限内预期将影响套期关系的套期无效部分产生的原因。企业至少应当在</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">资产负债表日及相关情形发生重大变化将影响套期有效性要求时对套期关系进行评估。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 15.55pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">一般情况下，套期工具和被套期项目的公允价值或现金流量变动难以实现完全抵销，因而会</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">出现套期无效部分。套期工具的公允价值或现金流量变动大于或小于被套期项目的公允价值或现</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">金流量变动的部分为套期无效部分。在计量套期无效部分时，企业应当考虑货币的时间价值。套期无效部分的形成源于多方面的因素。这些因素通常包括：</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体>①</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">套期工具和被套期项目以不同的货</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">币表示；</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体>②</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">套期工具和被套期项目有不同的到期期限；</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体>③</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">套期工具和被套期项目内含不同的利率</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">或权益指数变量；</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体>④</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">套期工具和被套期项目使用不同市场的商品价格标价；</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体>⑤</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">套期工具和被套期项目对应不同</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">的交易对手；</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体>⑥</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">套期工具在套期开始时的公允价值不等于零等。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 15.55pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">为计算被套期项目的价值变动，企业可使用其条款与被套期项目的主要条款相匹配的衍生工具（通常称为</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体>“</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">虚拟衍生工具</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体>”</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">）。在使用虚拟衍生工具估计被套期项目的价值时，不能使用仅存</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">在于套期工具中而被套期项目不具备的特征。例如，对于以外币计价的债务（无论固定利率还是</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">浮动利率），企业在使用虚拟衍生工具计算该债务的价值变动或其现金流量累计变动的现值时，即便实际的衍生工具的不同货币汇兑可能包括汇兑费用，虚拟衍生工具也不能简单地直接反映这种费用，因为被套期项目中可能不包含这项费用。在评估被套期项目和套期工具之间是否存在经济关系时，企业可以采用定性或定量的方法。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 15.55pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 21.8pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto; mso-char-indent-count: 2.0"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">如果套期工具和被套期项目的主要条款（例如名义金额、到期期限和基础变量）均匹配或大致相</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">符，企业可以根据此类主要条款进行定性评估。如果套期工具和被套期项目的主要条款并非基本匹配，企业可能需要进行定量评估（例如通过比较被套期风险引起的套期工具和被套期项</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> 0</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">公允价值或现金流量变动的比率，或通过采用回归分析方法分析套期工具和被套期项目价值变动的相</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">关性），但两个变量之间仅仅存在某种统计相关性的事实本身不足以有效证明套期工具与被套期项目之间存在经济关系。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 15.55pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 21.8pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto; mso-char-indent-count: 2.0"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">企业的风险管理策略是评估套期关系是否符合套期有效性要求的主要信息来源。这意味着，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">用于决策目的的管理分析信息可作为评估套期关系是否符合套期有效性要求的依据。因此，套期</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">有效性评价方法应当与企业的风险管理策略相吻合，并在套期开始时就在风险管理有关的正式文件中详细加以说明。如果相关情况发生变化从而影响套期有效性，企业可能需要改变评估套期关</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">系是否符合套期有效性要求的方法，以确保该评估仍能够考虑套期关系的相关特征（包括套期无</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">效部分的来源）。当评估套期有效性的方法发生改变时，应当对套期关系书面文件作相应更新。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm auto 26.1pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 0.1pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><A 
name=_bookmark263></A><FONT size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">（二）套期关系再平衡</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> <SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 15.55pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 21.8pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto; mso-char-indent-count: 2.0"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">套期关系由于套期比率的原因而不再符合套期有效性要求，但指定该套期关系的风险管理目标没有改变的，企业应当进行套期关系再平衡。</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">本准则所称套期关系再平衡，是指对已经存在的套期关系中被套期项目或套期工具的数量进行调整，以使套期比率重新符合套期有效性要求。基于其他目的对被套期项目或套期工具所指定</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">的数量进行变动，例如仅对特定风险敞口更多或更少的数量进行套期以符合企业的风险管理策略，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">不构成本准则所称的套期关系再平衡。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 15.55pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 21.8pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto; mso-char-indent-count: 2.0"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">调整套期比率使得企业可以应对由于基础变量或风险变量而引起的套期工具和被套期项目</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">之间关系的变动。例如，当套期关系中的套期工具和被套期项目具有不同但是相关的基础变量（如</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">不同但相关的指数、比率或价格）时，套期关系会随着这两个基础变量之间关系的变动而发生变</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">化<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt">。</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">当</SPAN>套<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>工<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">具</SPAN>和<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">被</SPAN>套<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>项目<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">之</SPAN>间<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">关</SPAN>系<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">发</SPAN>生<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>变<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">动</SPAN>能通<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">过</SPAN>调<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">整</SPAN>套<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>比<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">率</SPAN>得<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">以</SPAN>弥补<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">时</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">再</SPAN>平<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">衡将</SPAN>可</SPAN><FONT face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">以使<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">得</SPAN>套<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>关<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">系</SPAN>得<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">到</SPAN>延<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">续</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt">。</SPAN>但<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">是</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt">，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">在</SPAN>套<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>工<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">具</SPAN>与<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">被</SPAN>套期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">项</SPAN>目<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">之</SPAN>间<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>关<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">系</SPAN>变<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">动</SPAN>不能<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">通</SPAN>过<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">调</SPAN>整<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">套期</SPAN>比率来<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">弥</SPAN>补<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>情<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">况</SPAN>下<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">，</SPAN>再<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">平</SPAN>衡并<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">不</SPAN>能<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">促</SPAN>使<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">套</SPAN>期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">关</SPAN>系<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">得</SPAN>到延<SPAN

</SPAN><SPAN lang=EN-US>A<SPAN style="LETTER-SPACING: -1.2pt"> 
</SPAN></SPAN><SPAN style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>风<SPAN

</SPAN><SPAN lang=EN-US>A </SPAN>和外币<SPAN style="LETTER-SPACING: -3.6pt"> 
</SPAN><SPAN lang=EN-US>B<SPAN style="LETTER-SPACING: -3.45pt"> 
</SPAN></SPAN><SPAN style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">之</SPAN>间<SPAN

lang=EN-US> A </SPAN>与外币<SPAN lang=EN-US> B 
</SPAN>的汇率发生了变动（即设定了一个新区间或汇率），则再平衡套期关系以反映新汇率，可确保套期关系在新情况下的套期比率继续满足套期有效性的要求。但是，如果外币衍生工具发生违约，则更改套期比率并不能确保套期关系能够继续满足套期有效性的要求。<SPAN

face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">的变<SPAN

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">响</SPAN>套<SPAN

<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 10.9pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体>1.</FONT> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">抵销程度的变化属于围绕套期比率的正常波动（即能够继续适当反映套期工具与被套期</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">项目之间的关系）；</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 10.9pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体>2.</FONT> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">抵销程度的变化表明套期比率不再能够恰当反映套期工具与被套期项目之间的关系。</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">为应对每一特定结果而调整套期比率的做法，并不能减少围绕某个固定套期比率的上下波动及由此产生的套期无效部分。在该情况下，只需对套期无效部分进行确认和计量，而无需作出再平衡。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 10.9pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">与此相反，如果抵销程度的变化表明该波动围绕着一个套期比率，而该套期比率不同于当前</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">针对该套期关系所使用的套期比率，或存在偏离目前采用的套期比率的趋势，企业可以通过调整</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">套期比率来降低套期无效部分，而保留原套期比率将显著增加套期的无效部分。在该情况下，企业必须评价套期关系是否反映出被套期项目与套期工具之间权重的失衡，这种失衡可能产生套期无效（无论确认与否），并可能产生与套期会计目标不一致的会计结果。如果套期比率被调整，则会同时影响套期无效部分的确认和计量。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="LETTER-SPACING: 0.2pt"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>

face=宋体>(2)</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体">由于法律法规或其他相关规定的要求，套期工具的原交易对手方变更为一个或多个清算</SPAN><SPAN 
style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体">交易对手方（例如清算机构或其他主体），以最终达成由同一中央交易对手方进行清算的目的。</SPAN><SPAN 
style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体">如果存在套期工具其他变更的，该变更应当仅限于替换交易对手方所必须的变更。在将原交易对</SPAN><SPAN 
style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体">手方更换为清算交易对手方并确认相应变更的影响时，应当将该影响反映在套期工具的计量中，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体">进而纳入对套期有效性的评估和计量。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 10.55pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体">例如，对于套期关系中被指定为套期工具的衍生工具，由于新的法律法规要求变更为中央交</SPAN><SPAN 
style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体">易对手方，且该变更仅涉及替换交易对手方所必须的变更，则企业应当将原有衍生工具终止确认，</SPAN><SPAN 
style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体">并新确认变更交易对手方后的衍生工具，但是变更前的套期关系将作为持续的套期关系进行会计</SPAN><SPAN 
style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体">处理，企业无需对套期关系终止运用套期会计。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>

<P style="MARGIN: 0px 14px 8px 0px; TEXT-INDENT: 28px"><SPAN

size=3>【例24】2×17年1月1日，甲公司为规避所持有铜存货公允价值变动风险，与某金融机构签订了一项铜期货合同，并将其指定为对2×17年前两个月铜存货的商品价格变化引起的公允价值变动风险的套期工具。铜期货合同的标的资产与被套期项目铜存货在数量、质次和产地方面相同。假设不考虑期货市场中每日无负债结算制度的影响。</FONT></SPAN></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0px 14px 8px 0px; TEXT-INDENT: 28px"><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt; FONT-FAMILY: 楷体"><FONT 
size=3>2×17年1月1日，铜期货合同的公允价值为0，被套期项目（铜存货）的账面价值和成本均为1000000元，公允价值为1100000元。2×17年1月31日，铜期货合同公允价值上涨了25000元，铜存货的公允价值下降了25000元。2×17年2月28日，铜期货合同公允价值下降了15000元，铜存货的公允价值上升了15000元。当日，甲公司将铜存货以1090000元的价格出售，并将铜期货合同结算。</FONT></SPAN></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0px 14px 8px 0px; TEXT-INDENT: 28px"><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt; FONT-FAMILY: 楷体"><FONT 
size=3>甲公司通过分析发现，铜存货与铜期货合同存在经济关系，且经济关系产生的价值变动中信用风险不占主导地位，套期比率也反映了套期的实际数量，符合套期有效性要求。</FONT></SPAN></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0px 14px 8px 0px; TEXT-INDENT: 28px"><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt; FONT-FAMILY: 楷体"><FONT 
size=3>假定不考虑商品销售相关的增值税及其他因素，甲公司的账务处理如下：</FONT></SPAN></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0px 14px 8px 0px; TEXT-INDENT: 28px"><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt; FONT-FAMILY: 楷体"><FONT 
size=3>(1)2×17年1月1日，指定铜存货为被套期项目：</FONT></SPAN></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0px 14px 8px 0px; TEXT-INDENT: 28px"><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt; FONT-FAMILY: 楷体"><FONT size=3>借：被套期项目——库存商品铜 &nbsp; 
&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;1000000</FONT></SPAN></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0px 14px 8px 0px; TEXT-INDENT: 28px"><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt; FONT-FAMILY: 楷体"><FONT size=3>贷：库存商品——铜 &nbsp; &nbsp; 
&nbsp; &nbsp;1000000</FONT></SPAN></P>

style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">工</SPAN>具<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">形</SPAN>成<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>利<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">得</SPAN>或损<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">失</SPAN>中<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">属</SPAN>于<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">套</SPAN>期<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">无</SPAN>效<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">的</SPAN>部分<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">，</SPAN>应<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">当</SPAN>计<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">入</SPAN>当<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期</SPAN>损<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">益</SPAN>。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 26.25pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-char-indent-count: 2.5" 
align=left><FONT size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT 
face=宋体>2.</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体">多个母公司进行的套期。</SPAN><SPAN 
style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体">在一项由境外经营净投资产生的外汇风险的套期中，被套期项目的金额可以等于或小于母公司合并财务报表中该境外经营净资产账面价值。企业可以将被套期风险指定为境外经营的记账本</SPAN><SPAN 
style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体">位币与其任何母公司（直接的、中间的或最终的母公司）的记账本位币之间产生的外汇风险敞口。</SPAN><SPAN 
style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体">通过中间母公司持有净投资不影响最终母公司所面临外汇风险的性质。但是，境外经营净投资产生的外汇风险敞口只有在合并财务报表中才可能符合套期会计的条件。如果同一境外经营净资产的同一风险被集团内部一家以上的母公司（例如，直接和间接母公司）分别进行套期，则在最终母公司合并财务报表中只有一项套期关系符合套期会计的条件。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 26.25pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-char-indent-count: 2.5" 
align=left><FONT size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体">如果一项套期关系由较低层次间接母公司在其合并财务报表中进行了指定，那么在更高层次</SPAN><SPAN 
style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体">的母公司合并财务报表中可以决定保留该套期关系或重新指定。如果较高层次的母公司决定不保留该套期关系而是重新指定，那么，在较高层次母公司的合并财务报表中必须先转回较低层次母公司所运用的套期会计，再按照重新指定的套期关系运用套期会计。相反地，套期会计可以在较高层次母公司的合并财务报表中直接指定，不必在较低层次间接母公司的合并财务报表中进行指定。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm auto 26.1pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT face=宋体>3.</FONT> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">集</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">团<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">内</SPAN>可<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">以</SPAN>持<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">有</SPAN>套<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">期工</SPAN>具的<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">企</SPAN>业。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 21pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-char-indent-count: 2.0"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体">一项衍生或非衍生金融工具（或衍生和非衍生金融工具的组合）可以被指定为境外经营净投资套期工具。只要满足本准则对境外经营净投资套期的指定、文件记录和有效性要求，套期工具就可由集团内部的任一家或几家企业持有。如果持有套期工具的企业的记账本位币与投资于境外经营的母公司的记账本位币相同，就较容易进行套期有效性评估，因为在评估套期有效性时，可以假设持有境外经营的母公司也同时持</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体">有套期工具。如果持有套期工具的企业的记账本位币与投资于境外经营的母公司的记账本位币不</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体">同，评估套期有效性会较为复杂。这种情况下，套期有效性不仅要反映持有套期工具的企业的利得或损失（如果不使用套期会计，应计入合并损益），还应当反映对套期工具重新折算为母公司记账本位币的影响（如果不使用套期会计，应在合并其他综合收益中确认）。</SPAN><SPAN 
style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><FONT face=宋体> </FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体">有效性的评估并不受套期工具是否是衍生工具的影响，也不受合并方法的影响。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US style="mso-bidi-font-family: 宋体"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>

<P style="MARGIN: 0px 14px 8px 0px; TEXT-INDENT: 28px"><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt; FONT-FAMILY: 楷体"><FONT 
size=3>【例31】2×16年1月1日，甲公司预计在未来12个月内采购100万桶西德克萨斯中质原油（WTI原油）。甲公司采用现金流量套期，并购入105万桶布伦特原油（Brent原油）期货合约，以对极可能发生的100万桶WTI原油的预期采购进行套期（套期比率为1:1.05)。该期货合约在指定日的公允价值为0。</FONT></SPAN></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0px 14px 8px 0px; TEXT-INDENT: 28px"><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt; FONT-FAMILY: 楷体"><FONT 
size=3>2×16年6月30日，被套期项目WTI原油的预期采购自套期开始的预计未来现金流量现值的累计变动额为200万美元，套期工具的公允价值累计下降了229万美元。甲公司通过分析发现，Brent原油相对WTI原油的经济关系与预期不同，因此考虑对套期关系进行再平衡。甲公司通过分析决定将套期比率重新设定为1:0.98。</FONT></SPAN></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0px 14px 8px 0px; TEXT-INDENT: 28px"><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt; FONT-FAMILY: 楷体"><FONT 
size=3>为了在2×16年6月30日进行再平衡，甲公司可以指定更大的被套期风险敞口或终止指定部分套期工具。甲公司决定选择后者，即终止指定7万桶Brent原油期货合约的套期工具。</FONT></SPAN></P>

size=3><SPAN lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>1.</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">被套期项目与交易相关的，对其进行套期的期权的时间价值具备该项交易成本的特征。如果该被套期项目导致确认一项初始计量包含交易成本的项目（如企业对预期交易或确定承诺涉及的商品价格风险进行套期，并将交易成本纳入存货的初始计量），则期权的时间价值应纳入特定的被套期项目的初始计量。与此类似，对构成预期交易或确定承诺商品销售的商品价格风险进行套期的企业，应当将期权的时间价值作为销售成本的一部分，在被套期的销售确认收入的相同期间计入损益。具体而言，企业应当将期权时间价值的公允价值变动中与被套期项目相关的部分计入其他综合收益，并按照与现金流量套期储备相同的会计处理方法进行处理。</SPAN><SPAN

face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">值的变动计入其他综合收益。如果期权的时间价值涉及与交易相关的被套期项目，在套期关系结束时调整被套期项目或是重分类至损益的时间价值为零；如果期权的时间价值涉及与时间段相关</SPAN><FONT

lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P><SPAN lang=EN-US

style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">生</SPAN>的信<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">用</SPAN>风<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">险</SPAN>敞<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">口</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.85pt">。</SPAN><SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">例</SPAN>如<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -1pt">，</SPAN>金融<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">机</SPAN>构<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">运用</SPAN>信用衍<SPAN 
style="LETTER-SPACING: -0.15pt">生</SPAN>工具对信用风险敞口进行套期以将其贷款或贷款承诺的信用损失风险转移至第三方。但是根据《企业会计准则第</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体> 22</FONT> </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">号</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><FONT face=宋体>——</FONT></SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">金融工具确认和计量》的相关规定，企业的信用衍生工具应当以公允价值计量且其变动计入当期损益，而贷款等并不一定以公允价值计量且其变动计入当期损益（如按摊余成本计量或尚未确认）。因此，在被套期风险敞口未按与信用衍生工具相同的基础进行计量的情况下，将会产生会计错配。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">由于金融项目的信用风险通常无法单独识别，不属于符合条件的被套期项目，因此使用信用衍生工具对信用风险敞口进行套期的企业将无法运用套期会计。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 10.6pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 20.95pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto"><FONT 
size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">为解决这一问题，并允许企业在一定程度上反映其信用风险管理活动，本准则允许企业可以</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">选择采用以公允价值计量且其变动计入当期损益的方式计量被套期风险敞口的方法替代套期会</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">计。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle 
style="MARGIN: auto 1.7pt auto 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%; TEXT-INDENT: 15.75pt; mso-mirror-indents: yes; mso-add-space: auto; mso-char-indent-count: 1.5"><A 
name=_bookmark274></A><FONT size=3><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">（一）指定条件</SPAN><FONT

style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">本准则规定，企业使用以公允价值计量且其变动计入当期损益的信用衍生工具管理金融工具（或其组成部分）的信用风险敞口时，可以在该金融工具（或其组成部分）初始确认时、后续计</SPAN><FONT 
face=宋体> </FONT><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">量中或尚未确认时，将其指定为以公允价值计量且其变动计入当期损益的金融工具，并同时作出书面记录，但应当同时满足下列条件：</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle

lang=EN-US><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></P>
<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle

<P class=MsoBodyTextCxSpMiddle

style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">年期看跌期权，</SPAN> 
<SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">并将上述看跌期权的内在价值指定为套期工具，对该债券的公允价值变动风险进行套期。甲公司</SPAN> 
<SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">自</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US> 2018 </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">年</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US> 1 </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">月</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US> 1 </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">日起实施本准则。由于该套期关系在甲公司</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US> 2018 </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">年度财务报表的最早比较期间的期初（即</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US> 2017 </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">年</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US> 1 </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">月</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US> 1 </SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">日）已经存在，因此，甲公司应当根据本准则对期权时间价值的会计</SPAN> 
<SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">处理要求予以追溯调整，即将上述期权时间价值的公允价值变动中与被套期项目相关的部分先计</SPAN> 
<SPAN 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin">入其他综合收益，再按照本准则要求摊销至各期损益。</SPAN></FONT></FONT><SPAN 
lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-fareast; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
